TEXT: A spellcaster runic with the audacity to declare what is right or wrong.
Good job team! Couldn't have done it without me.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, your aura senses twinge in recognition. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~marked~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
